Desc.entry: Local office of the Royal Mencap Society, a national charity which campaigns to ensure that people with learning disabilities get the best possible opportunities to live as full citizens. Also provides a range of housing and education services, as well as an employment service to help people prepare for and find employment (this service is only available to people living in South Yorkshire, please contact to check eligability).

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
